title: The new Taliyah's W is awful. Really really awful.
body:
Seriously. 

Its clunky and embarrasingly bad. Vector casting sucks why even put it. I dont ''main'' Taliyah but I play her enough (50+) to see this change only dumbed her down, nerfed her damages and removed one of her skill checks.

Can Riot consider a revert? The change was awful. IDK who they asked for this, but clearly not Taliyah experienced players.

replies.body:
I don't play rumble cause of his horribad ult.
seriously corks w does more damage and isn't some slow mechanic.

They now killed tali... like it took much of a push.

Released insane mana cost problems even on ARAM (yes with massive mana regen)
her mechanic to keep moving.. in game about "lanes"

her low damage of other skills with HIGH cd's than her 
pre-remake fiddlestick problem of low damage/ratio with multiple strikes (stack pen)

At his point she is almost better off going EVE route ..
Buy cool skin and just pretend your helping.

The ones who asked for it were the ones who played less than three games and don't know shit about the ability. I wasn't completely against it at the start, but the implementation was fucking awful. Added delay and clunkiness. If they just changed it back to the way it was last patch I would love that (though removing the lock out on summoners specifically would be nice).

> [{quoted}](name=LuigiTSG,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=oYwUbPBg,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-07-14T05:00:15.879+0000)
>
> The ones who asked for it were the ones who played less than three games and don't know shit about the ability. I wasn't completely against it at the start, but the implementation was fucking awful. Added delay and clunkiness. If they just changed it back to the way it was last patch I would love that (though removing the lock out on summoners specifically would be nice).

taliyahs w being "terrible" was kind of a running joke, like how teemo is "satan" despite simultaneously being the worst champ in league. people toss around memes without caring if its true or not.

i thought the same thing about taliyah, but after playing her in 6.13 I learned pretty quick after like, 2 games and got used to it. People vastly overstated how bad it was.

I'd personally be willing to bet that 90% of the people who were asking for the change played one game, told themselves it was awful, and never touched it again. What I want to know is how this change went though without a single playtester saying that input delay felt awful.

I asked for this, and I have had 2 mastery 6 tokens for Taliyah for more than a month (no blue essence).  Vector casting is far more fluid than the clunky thing the designer made simply because he fails at vector casting.
